sectionHeader.title: Proven Results Across Industries
sectionHeader.subtitle: See how document intelligence transforms business operations

testimonials.quote: We reduced tender preparation time from 3 weeks to 3 days. Our win rate increased by 40% because we can now bid on more opportunities and provide more competitive pricing with accurate analysis.
testimonials.author: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.title: Head of Business Development

testimonials.quote: BOQ generation that used to take our team 2 weeks now happens in 2 hours. The accuracy is incredible - we've eliminated 90% of estimation errors and can take on 3x more projects.
testimonials.author: Priya Sharma
testimonials.title: Project Manager, Construction Division

testimonials.quote: Processing insurance claims and damage reports is now instant instead of days. Our claim settlement time improved by 60% and customer satisfaction scores are at an all-time high.
testimonials.author: Amit Patel
testimonials.title: Director of Operations
